About Me

As an aspiring Data Scientist, I thrive on transforming complex datasets into actionable insights. My academic journey at Indiana University, pursuing a Master's in Applied Data Science, has equipped me with a strong foundation in machine learning, deep learning, and data analysis techniques. My experience as a Graduate Assistant has honed my ability to communicate technical concepts clearly and contribute to impactful research. I am driven by a passion for innovation and a commitment to building intelligent systems that solve real-world problems.

Let's Connect
